body: @amihaiemil[/z](https://www.0crat.com/u/amihaiemil) please, pay attention to this issue

@paulodamaso[/z](https://www.0crat.com/u/paulodamaso) this project will fix the problem faster if you donate a few dollars to it; just [click here](https://www.0crat.com/contrib/C9R53K5JA) and pay via Stripe, it's very fast, convenient and appreciated; thanks a lot!
@paulodamaso thanks for reporting. Interested in contributing with a PR? It's just me, the ARC, and one other DEV on this project which, unfortunately, is not funded :(

Job [#1425](https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/issues/1425) is now in scope, role is `DEV`

<!-- https://www.0crat.com/footprint/C9R53K5JA/2340648202, version: 0.30.9, hash: ${buildNumber} -->

The job [#1425](https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/issues/1425) assigned to @paulodamaso[/z](https://www.0crat.com/u/paulodamaso), here is [why](https://www.0crat.com/footprint/C9R53K5JA/2340648201); the budget is 30 minutes, see [§4](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#4); please, read [§8](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#8) and [§9](http://www.zerocracy.com/policy.html#9); if the task is not clear, read [this](http://www.yegor256.com/2015/02/16/it-is-not-a-school.html) and [this](http://www.yegor256.com/2015/01/15/how-to-cut-corners.html); there will be no monetary reward for this job

Job `gh:jcabi/jcabi-github#1425` already assigned to @paulodamaso, can't assign to @paulodamaso

<!-- https://www.0crat.com/footprint/C9R53K5JA/2340648233, version: 0.30.9, hash: ${buildNumber} -->
